import React, { Component } from 'react'; import AdminLayout from './layouts/AdminLayout'; import AdminStyleSheet from './components/style-sheets/adminStyleSheet'; import { Nav, Form, FormControl, Button, Spinner, Tab, Row, Col, } from "react-bootstrap" import Vendors from './components/dashboards/admin-dashboard/vendors'; import Customers from './components/dashboards/admin-dashboard/customers'; import Products from './components/dashboards/admin-dashboard/products'; import ProductCategories from './components/dashboards/admin-dashboard/product-categories'; import Inventory from './components/dashboards/admin-dashboard/inventory'; import Discounts from './components/dashboards/admin-dashboard/discount'; import Commision from './components/dashboards/admin-dashboard/commision'; import Reports from './components/dashboards/admin-dashboard/reports'; class AdminDashboard extends Component { state = { sideDrawerOpen: false }; backdropClickHandler = () => { this.setState({ sideDrawerOpen: false }); }; render() { let drawerClasses = "side-drawer"; if (this.state.sideDrawerOpen) { drawerClasses = "side-drawer open"; } return (
